description:
Speaker: Pratap Vardhan

The explosion of open data, especially government data has made it easy for us to see our own governance in a better light.

Details: https://in.pycon.org/cfp/pycon-india-2015/proposals/consuming-government-data-with-python-and-d3/
title: Consuming Government Data with Python and D3 - PyCon India 2015
